quotes.quote: A ship is always safe at shore but that is not what it's built for.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Better to see something once than hear about it a thousand times.
This is the start of an amazing adventure.
Love adventure. Be passionate. Howl at the moon.
I feel adventurous. There are so many doors to be opened, and I'm not afraid to look behind them.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Kids are curious, and if you don't lose that, then everything is an adventure.
The goal isn't to live forever. The goal is to live each moment so fully that it lasts in your heart forever.
You're off to great places. Today is your day. Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: If you think adventures are dangerous, try routine: it's lethal.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Do it even if it scares you.
Caterpillars don't become butterflies until they let go of the past and fearlessly seek the future.
Go out in the woods, go out. If you don't go out in the woods, nothing will ever happen, and your life will never begin.
If happiness is the goal – and it should be, then adventures should be a top priority.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Living the life of your dreams is the biggest adventure of all.
Spend more time with people who can make even the simplest moment feel like an epic adventure.
That which is dreamed can never be lost, can never be undreamed.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Every new friendship is an adventure waiting to happen.
You can do this; you can create your own happiness.
It's bad manners to keep an adventure waiting.
Be careful going in search of adventure – it's ridiculously easy to find.
If we were meant to stay in one place, we'd have roots instead of feet.
With good health and an adventurous spirit, there are no limits to where you'll go.
Take only memories, leave only footprints.
quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.quote: Some adventures require nothing more than a willing heart and the ability to trip over the cracks in the world.
Adventures don't come calling like unexpected cousins calling from out of town. You have to go looking for them.
Travel doesn't become adventure until you leave yourself behind.
Life is meant for good friends and great adventures.
It's time for a new adventure.
Deciding what you want is often the most difficult step. But once you know where you're going, the road reveals itself.
Adventure is worthwhile.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Because in the end, you won't remember the time you spent working in the office or mowing your lawn. Climb that goddamn mountain.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Live, travel, adventure, bless, and don't be sorry.
Adventure may hurt you but monotony will kill you.
All actual life is encounter.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: It is the adventure and uncertainties of the journey that makes life so beautiful and interesting.
Every man can transform the world from one of monotony and drabness to one of excitement and adventure.
quotes.author: Irving Wallace
